attributes.action: Stop the destruction of Green Belt Site on Oldnall Road, Halesowen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to stop the building of the the proposed Cradley Speedway on Oldnall Road in Halesowen(and any future developments). The plans which have been submitted to Dudley Council, if passed will total destroy an area not only of natural beauty but one with significant archaeological value and an abundance of wildlife. The additional increase in levels of noise poultion, air pollution, and traffic density that will deteriorate the quality of life of all those who live in the surround areas for years to come.
